home.intro: A front-end developer and designer with more than 5 years of experience in web development and design.
home.intro2: I speak Turkish, English, and Japanese. I'm based in Tokyo, Japan.
home.atsumariDescription: A virtual gathering space where office workers, students, and event participants can gather, talk, share, and collaborate.
home.techStackDescription: I mostly use Vue, Vite, TypeScript, SASS, and Supabase to build web applications but work with a wide range of technologies and tools like Nuxt, Svelte, Tailwind, Figma...
